1.title: Living Hope and Holiness
1.keyEvent: Exhortation to holiness through the living hope in Christ

2.title: Living Stones and Royal Priesthood
2.keyEvent: Believers described as living stones and a holy priesthood

3.title: Suffering for Righteousness
3.keyEvent: Instructions on suffering and Christ's example of suffering

4.title: Living for God
4.keyEvent: Encouragement to live for God amid suffering and judgment

5.title: Elders and Humble Service
5.keyEvent: Exhortations to elders and young men to serve humbly
